document.title: Hot Topic: The MTAS Salary Survey and Fringe Benefit Survey (1995-96)
document.abstract: The MT AS annual salary and fringe benefit survey for 95/96 is complete and shows salary increases for city employees rose at a rate slower than 94/95. This report contains a summary of the findings, in addition to a means to request specific information.

field.name: comments
field.value:
